column4: Hey guys, I've installed gnome-shell and I'm using the "gnome classic" interface... (I dont like unity). I am unable to add icons to the desktop.... I'm also unable to insert icons to the top bar... how do I solve it?
in oneiric I used this link http://www.ubuntugeek.com/how-to-create-desktop-launchers-in-ubuntu-11-10oneiric.html
